description: After a Father's Day gift idea? Make dad something he'll go nuts for with this easy and delicious salt and vinegar roasted nuts recipe.
name: Salt & Vinegar Roasted Nuts Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Line a large baking tray with banking paper.

Place nuts on tray lined and bake for 20 minutes, stirring halfway through, or until golden. Remove from oven. Drizzle immediately with vinegar and sprinkle with sea salt flakes. Toss to combine. Set aside to cool completely. Store in an airtight jar.
